H0.text: DNA and proteins are what chromosomes are made of.

H1.text: Amino acids are the components that make up chromosomes.

H2.text: Chromosomes are made of sperm and proteins.

H3.text: Muscle tissue is what chromosomes are made of.

A4.text: A chromosome is a package of DNA containing part or all of the genetic material of an organism.

A5.text: In most chromosomes, the very long thin DNA fibers are coated with nucleosome-forming packaging proteins
